Condition: Light Stress
Problem: Surface temperature rises rapidly on startup.
Remedy: Ensure thermal paste is properly applied.

Condition: Light Stress
Problem: The unit gets warm quickly even during light tasks.
Remedy: Inspect the cooling fans and clear any dust buildup.

Remedy: Check motor bearings and adjust torque.

Condition: Tool Wear
Problem: Machine emits high noise during cutting.
Remedy: Inspect for dull or broken tool bits.

Condition: Tool Wear
Problem: Tool effectiveness has decreased gradually.
Remedy: Sharpen or change the cutting head.
